Package stkim1.view.MTImageMapView

Class MTImageMapView

java.lang.Object
android.view.View
android.widget.ImageView
androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView
stkim1.view.MTImageMapView.MTImageMapView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener, androidx.core.view.TintableBackgroundView, androidx.core.widget.TintableImageSourceView
public class MTImageMapView extends androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView implements android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener
MTImageMapView lets a user to select a polygon map on an image.
Since:
0.1
Version:
%I%, %G%
Author:
stkim1

  • Method Details

    • onGlobalLayout

      public void onGlobalLayout()
      Once this MTImageMapView is measured, layered, and drawn, we can get the actual drawable matrix, which would guide us to map a touch point on the drawable and help us to draw vertices of MTPolygon maps.
      Specified by:
      onGlobalLayout in interface android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener

    • performClick

      public boolean performClick()
      Overrides:
      performClick in class android.view.View

    • onTouchEvent

      public boolean onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent tEvent)
      Overrides:
      onTouchEvent in class android.view.View
      See Also:
      • MTImageMapTouch

    • getPathColor

      @NonNull public android.graphics.Paint getPathColor()
      Get the color and style of vertices line for debugging purpose.
      Returns:
      non-null vertices line color in android.graphics.Paint.

    • setPathColor

      public void setPathColor(@NonNull android.graphics.Paint pColor)
      Set the color and style of vertices line for debugging purpose.
      Parameters:
      pColor - non-null vertices line color in android.graphics.Paint.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if pColor is null.

    • isPathVisible

      public boolean isPathVisible()
      Get the visibility of vertices line for debugging purpose.
      Returns:
      true if vertices line path is set to be visible, false otherwise.

    • setPathVisible

      public void setPathVisible(boolean pShow)
      Set the visibility of vertices line for debugging purpose.
      Parameters:
      pShow - true if vertices line path is visible, false otherwise.

    • setTouchedMapReceiver

      public void setTouchedMapReceiver(MTImageMapTouch tReceiver)
      Set the instance of MTImageMapTouch interface.
      Parameters:
      tReceiver - to receive touch map event. Pass null to set it free.
      See Also:
      • MTImageMapTouch

    • setPolygons

      public void setPolygons(List<MTPolygon> pList)
      Set A list of MTPolygon. Everytime you pass a List<MTPolygon>, the existing list will be wiped clean, and the new list is set to be used.
      Parameters:
      pList - Pass a List<MTPolygon> of polygon maps for the image of this view. Send null if you want to empty the list.
